Pre-Game Insights: The Proteas earned a place in Group 2 of the Super 8 stage, along with defending champions England, co-hosts West Indies, and the USA.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The first match of the Super 8's sees South Africa face tournament surprise package USA at Sir Vivian Richards Stadium in Antigua on Wednesday 19 June.
Others: The top two teams from each of the Super 8 groups will advance to the semifinals of the global showpiece, with the final taking place on 29 June in Bridgetown.
